definition: Li Lianjie or Jet Li (1963-), martial arts sportsman, subsequently film star and director
plum
surname Li
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
surname Lian
variant of 傑|杰[jie2]
hero/heroic/outstanding person/prominent/distinguished

sentences.english: Jet Li has decided to quit acting for a year to focus on disaster relief and reconstruction of quake-hit areas.
sentences.chinese: 李连杰决定息影一年，专注赈灾及灾区重建工作。

sentences.english: The end of the year, Jet Li's heart is still hanging.
sentences.chinese: 进入岁末，李连杰的心仍悬着。

sentences.english: Li himself escorted the first shipment of supplies two days later.
sentences.chinese: 在两天后，李连杰自己护送了一批救援物资。

sentences.english: In 1982, wushu champion Jet Li appeared in the film Shaolin Temple.
sentences.chinese: 1982年，武术冠军李连杰主演了电影《少林寺》。

sentences.english: Jet Li is (the most popular) actor in China.
sentences.chinese: 李连杰是中国最受欢迎的男演员。

sentences.english: And this one quarter, they invited a class meetings jet li uncle.
sentences.chinese: 而这一节班会课，他们请来了李连杰叔叔。

sentences.english: Jet Li needs these entrepreneurs as much as Clinton needs Murdoch.
sentences.chinese: 李连杰就像克乳顿需黑默多克泽样需黑这些回业家们。

sentences.english: In this film Li Lianjie played the part of a Shaolin monk.
sentences.chinese: 在这部电影中李连杰扮演一个少林和尚。

sentences.english: First of all, Jet Li needs them to provide start-up capital for him.
sentences.chinese: 首守，李连杰需黑他们为他提快启原资金。

sentences.english: Jet Li is Nameless in Hero.
sentences.chinese: 在《英雄》中李连杰无名寂寂。

sentences.english: The men who sat next to us are good at Kongfu, they have studied in the same Kongfu school with Jet Lee.
sentences.chinese: 旁边坐着的是我们中国功夫的传人，李连杰的师弟们。

sentences.english: Today is martial arts legend Jet Li.
sentences.chinese: 今天，是武术传奇，李连杰。

sentences.english: If you watch this movie, you will know who Jet Li is.
sentences.chinese: 如果你看了《龙之吻》，你就会知道李连杰是谁。

sentences.english: Li has warned that Fearless might be his last martial arts movie.
sentences.chinese: 李连杰说《霍元甲》可能是他最后一部功夫电影。

sentences.english: Both Jacky Chan and Jet Li don't like to use stuntman in their films.
sentences.chinese: 成龙和李连杰在电影中都不爱用替身演员。

definition: Chow Yun-Fat (1955-), Hong Kong TV and film star
to succeed in life/to become somebody
Jackie Chan (1954-), kungfu film and Cantopop star
Andy Lau (1961-), Hong Kong Cantopop singer and actor
Bruce Lee (1940-1973), Hong Kong actor and martial arts expert
Stephen Chow (1962-), Hong Kong actor, comedian, screenwriter and film director, known for his mo lei tau 無厘頭|无厘头[wu2 li2 tou2] movies
Gordon Liu (1955-), Hong Kong action actor
Wong Fei Hung (1847-1924), famous martial artist and revolutionary
Gong Li (1965-), PRC female film star
Brigitte Lin (1954-), Taiwanese actress
Lau Ching-Wan (1964-), Hong Kong actor
Rosamund Kwan (1962-), Hong Kong actress
Danny Lee Sau-Yin (1953-), Hong Kong actor and director
Ge You (1957-), Chinese actor
acrobatic fighting in Chinese opera or dance
Zhao Benshan (1958-), universally known PRC TV comedian
Maggie Cheung (1964-), Hong Kong actress
